page.title: 10Sawston Education Contd.
page.content: The school has 42 children and two teachers. In{Sawston}there are three schools covering the primary age range. The{John Falkner}school,named after its headmaster between 1893 and 1926, has 250 children between 4 to 7 yrs.in buildings which originally housed the 'village school.' Due to the expansion of the village, a new Junior School was built in 1963. Its name{John Paxton}given in 1972 commemorates a man who was steward of the manor. In 1578-1580 he produced a survey of the area for his master,(his own Domesday Project!)It now has 310 children. { Icknield}C.P.School,named after the Icknield Way,opened in 1972 with only 17 pupils and 2 teachers. In 1985 200 pupils attend the school.
